Vanishing 3 [i](This permanent enters with three time counters on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a time counter from it. When the last is removed, sacrifice it.)[/i]
When this enchantment enters and each time you remove a time counter from it, create a 2/2 black Zombie creature token with “This token can't block.” That token gains haste until end of turn.
